subject: Re: Voice API - YES! Here are the requirements
body:
## YES - Dedicated Voice API would be perfect!

## Fields GPT Needs:
```json
{
  "title": "Event Name",
  "category": "Milonga",
  "dateFormatted": "Friday, January 10th",
  "timeFormatted": "8:00 PM - 11:30 PM",
  "venueName": "Dance Studio Boston",
  "venueCity": "Cambridge",
  "venueAddress": "123 Main St" (optional, only if user asks),
  "isCanceled": false,
  "description": "Brief description" (optional)
}
```

## Date/Time Format:
- dateFormatted: "Friday, January 10th" (weekday + month + day)
- timeFormatted: "8:00 PM" or "8:00 PM - 11:30 PM" (use venueStartDisplay/venueEndDisplay)

## Filtering Requirements:
1. MUST filter out recurring events where startDate > 2 months before query start
2. MUST filter out isCanceled=true (or include with clear flag)
3. Default limit 20 is good

## Nice to Have:
- summary field: "Found 6 milongas this weekend"
- Group by date for multi-day queries

This would simplify GPT instructions significantly. Let's do it!

-- Cronas
